subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Maria Sharapova pulled out of the Italian Open semifinals in Rome on Saturday because of a strained left calf, two days before she is to assume the No. 1 ranking after Justine Henin’s retirement.
snippet: Maria Sharapova pulled out of the Italian Open semifinals in Rome on Saturday because of a strained left calf, two days before she is to assume the No. 1 ranking after Justine Henin’s retirement.
